strings.SCRAPYARD_EXPANSION_DESC: Enables the content from the mod Fortunes from the Scrapyard.
strings.SCRAPYARD_ITEM_TAKEOUT_PICKUP: Gain a random stat buff for the rest of the stage.
strings.SCRAPYARD_ITEM_TAKEOUT_DESC: On the <style=cIsUtility>beginning of each stage</style>, gain a random <style=cIsDamage>damage</style>, <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style>, or <style=cIsHealing>base health regeneration</style> buff until the stage ends. Can increase base damage by <style=cIsDamage>{0}%</style> <style=cStack>(+{1}% per stack)</style>, movement speed by <style=cIsUtility>{2}%</style> <style=cStack>(+{3}% per stack)</style>, or base health regeneration by <style=cIsHealing>{4} hp/s</style> <style=cStack>({5} hp/s per stack)</style>
strings.SCRAPYARD_ITEM_MULTITOOL_PICKUP: The next interactable triggers an additional time. Regenerates every stage.
strings.SCRAPYARD_ITEM_MULTITOOL_DESC: The next interactable triggers an additional time. Regenerates every stage.
strings.SCRAPYARD_ITEM_MULTITOOLCONSUMED_PICKUP: It is no longer useful. Regenerates next stage.
strings.SCRAPYARD_ITEM_MULTITOOLCONSUMED_DESC: It is no longer useful. Regenerates next stage.
strings.SCRAPYARD_ITEM_LETHALINJECTION_DESC: Hits that deal <style=cIsDamage>more than 400% damage</style> also inflict a toxin that <style=cIsHealth>permanently</style> reduces maximum health by <style=cIsDamage>1%</style> every 0,5 seconds. Toxin lasts for <style=cIsUtility>5</style> seconds <style=cStack>(+2,5 per stack)</style>.
strings.SCRAPYARD_ITEM_COUNTERFEITCURRENCY_PICKU: Begin each stage with extra gold... <style=cIsHealth>BUT gain less gold.</style>
strings.SCRAPYARD_ITEM_COUNTERFEITCURRENCY_DESC: Begin each stage with <style=cIsDamage>${0} gold</style> <style=cStack>(+${1} per stack)</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Scales over time.</style> <style=cIsHealth>ALL other sources of income</style> are reduced by <style=cIsHealth>-{2}%</style> <style=cStack>(-{3}% per stack)</style>.
strings.SCRAPYARD_EQUIP_ENERGYBAR_PICKUP: Gain a brief health regeneration boost, a brief speed boost, and begin recharing shields.
strings.SCRAPYARD_EQUIP_ENERGYBAR_DESC: Increase <style=cIsHealing>health regen</style> by <style=cIsHealing>{1500}%</style> and increase <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> by <style=cIsUtility>{1}%</style> for <style=cIsUtility>{2}</style> seconds. Additionally begin recharging <style=cIsHealing>shield</style>.
strings.SCRAPYARD_ITEM_FAULTYTURBO_PICKUP: Chance to gain a massive speedboost while sprinting.
strings.SCRAPYARD_ITEM_FAULTYTURBO_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>{5}% chance</style> <style=cStack>(+{5}% per stack)</style> every <style=cIsUtility>{1}</style> second to increase <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> by <style=cIsUtility>{60}%</style> for <style=cIsUtility>{3}</style> seconds <style=cStack>(+{1.5} per stack)</style>.
